channel.title: Trump Administration on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Trump Administration on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Harvard beats Trump as judge orders US to restore $2.6 billion in funding
item.description: Judge rules Trump admin broke law, and says Supreme Court has been “unhelpful.”

item.title: Elon Musk’s “thermonuclear” Media Matters lawsuit may be fizzling out
item.description: Judge blocks FTC’s Media Matters probe as a likely First Amendment violation.

item.title: RFK Jr.’s Wi-Fi and 5G conspiracies appear to make it into MAHA report draft
item.description: The “Make Our Children Healthy Again Strategy” draft doesn’t mention top killers of kids.

item.title: Trump admin ranks companies on loyalty while handing out favors to Big Tech
item.description: US has halted enforcement actions against 165 corporations overall, report says.

item.title: US government agency drops Grok after MechaHitler backlash, report says
item.description: It appears Grok’s antisemitic rants stopped it from becoming feds’ go-to chatbot.

item.title: US executive branch agencies will use ChatGPT Enterprise for just $1 per agency
item.description: Questions linger about ideological bias in models as well as data security.

item.title: Whistleblower scientists outline Trump’s plan to politicize and dismantle NSF
item.description: Trump gutting NSF will forfeit scientific leadership to China, letter of dissent says.

item.title: California backs down to Trump admin, won’t force ISPs to offer $15 broadband
item.description: “Complete farce”: State lawmaker says US threatened to block broadband funding.

item.title: Trump admin squanders nearly 800,000 vaccines meant for Africa: Report
item.description: The mpox vaccines were pledged under the Biden administration.

item.title: Trump sues Corporation for Public Broadcasting directors who refused to be fired
item.description: CPB defied Trump, kept board members even after losing a court ruling.
